afterTime.description: The start date for a filtered date search on support case communications. Case communications are available for 12 months after creation.

beforeTime.description: The end date for a filtered date search on support case communications. Case communications are available for 12 months after creation.

caseIdList.description: A list of ID numbers of the support cases you want returned. The maximum number of cases is 100.

displayId.description: The ID displayed for a case in the AWS Support Center user interface.

includeCommunications.description: Specifies whether communications should be included in the DescribeCases results. The default is true.

includeResolvedCases.description: Specifies whether resolved support cases should be included in the DescribeCases results. The default is false.

language.description: The ISO 639-1 code for the language in which AWS provides support. AWS Support currently supports English ('en') and Japanese ('ja'). Language parameters must be passed explicitly for operations that take them.

maxResults.description: The maximum number of results to return before paginating.
